gobblin.data.management.copy

Class SubsetFilesCopyableDatasetFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.retention.profile.ConfigurableGlobDatasetFinder<CopyableDataset>
      • gobblin.data.management.copy.SubsetFilesCopyableDatasetFinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatasetsFinder<CopyableDataset>

    public class SubsetFilesCopyableDatasetFinder
extends ConfigurableGlobDatasetFinder<CopyableDataset>
    SubsetFilesCopyableDataset finder that extends ConfigurableGlobDatasetFinder. It lists files on the root path, and uses a user defined pattern to identify SubsetFilesCopyableDatasets and their corresponding subset of files.
